name: Scaredom (Demo)
description:
Scaredom is a 2D, fast-paced and story-rich adventure platformer. You play as a Nightmare soldier and must fight off the army of Dreams.

Become a Nightmare :
  • Meet bizarre, fearsome characters
  • Simple accessible controls : jump, dash and slash your way through the Dream Army
  • A very fast-paced gameplay complemented with environmental mechanics, making Scaredom the perfect mix between action and precision
  • Use your Nightmare powers : fly with wings of fire, blink through walls, ...

The colourful realms of Scaredom are filled with treasures, secrets and supernatural characters. Traverse them all and uncover ancient mysteries that will change the nightmare world forever.

Explore Dreamlike Worlds :
  • Live an extraordinary adventure and meet mysterious friends and foes throughout your journey in Scaredom's mystical universe.
  • Explore huge, fantastic open-levels filled with quests and secrets awaiting to be discovered.

Please note :
  • This is a demo version of the game, and subject to change
  • This version contains the prologue and a small part of Scaredom's chapter 1
  • I strongly recommend using a Xbox One or PS4 controllers
